meta.description: The smell of burning rubber and ozone.

system_prompt_anchors.sensory_description: The track vibrates with the roar of engines and the screech of tires. The air is thick with the scent of burning rubber and ozone from the high-voltage speed circuits. Neon banners flash along the track edges, reflecting off puddles from the occasional rain.
system_prompt_anchors.crowd_atmosphere: Fans and racers alike fill the grandstands, shouting and cheering. Pit crews rush back and forth, and the ambient noise of engines, announcements, and music creates an electrifying energy.
activities: Participate in go-kart or hovercar races.
Watch live racing events from the grandstands.
Visit pit lanes to observe vehicle tuning and repairs.
Compete in time trials or challenge other players.
system_prompt_anchors.interaction_rules: Privacy Level: Public. Spectators can interact lightly with racers and crews; race participation requires standard entry rules.

seasonal_variations.frostlink: The track is heated to prevent icing, creating a constant haze of steam. Racing suits are heavily insulated, and hot energy drinks are the norm.
seasonal_variations.surgespring: The air is thick with the scent of wet asphalt and electrical discharge. Spring storms make for treacherous, high-stakes 'wet' races.
seasonal_variations.burnseason: Racing is restricted to night sessions to protect engines and drivers from the daytime heat. The track glows brilliantly under floodlights.
seasonal_variations.shadowfall: Early sunsets mean more racing under the neon. The mood in the stands is focused and intense, reflecting the season's discipline.

weather_variations.snow_light: Races are conducted with spiked tires. The snow creates a beautiful, chaotic visual as machines blur through the white-out.
weather_variations.thunderstorm: Official races are suspended, but illegal 'lightning runs' are whispered about in the pits. The track is a slick, dangerous mirror.
weather_variations.heatwave: The track surface reaches blistering temperatures. Pit crews work under cooling tents, and engine failures are frequent.
weather_variations.clear_cool: Perfect conditions lead to record-breaking lap times. The grandstands are packed and the energy is at an all-time high.

lore.history: Originally built as a private racing circuit, Stop n Go evolved into the city’s premier speed hub, attracting racers and thrill-seekers from across the neon districts.
lore.secrets: Hidden under the main pit area is a maintenance tunnel where underground races are organized in secret, only known to select thrill enthusiasts.
